title: Jira API Get Project Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the get project operation in Jira API

components.id: List of the components contained in the project.

avatarUrls.id: The URLs of the project's avatars.

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.

roles.id: The name and self URL for each role defined in the project.

description.id: A brief description of the project.

lead.id: The username of the project lead.

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

issueTypes.id: List of the issue types available in the project.

name.id: The name of the issue type.

self.id: The URL of these issue type details.

description.id: The description of the issue type.

id.id: The ID of the issue type.

iconUrl.id: The URL of the issue type's avatar.

subtask.id: Whether this issue type is used to create subtasks.

expand.id: Additional project details in the response.

versions.id: The versions defined in the project.

self.id: The URL of the project details.

assigneeType.id: The default assignee when creating issues for this project.

projectTypeKey.id: The project type of the project.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
